round_best: Develop a deep learning-based virtual piano tutor that utilizes a combination of motion capture technology and generative adversarial networks (GANs). The system would track and analyze the user's hand and finger movements in real-time using motion sensors. It then compares these movements against an optimal model generated by the GAN, which has learned from a dataset of expert pianists, providing immediate personalized feedback and suggestions for improvement on movement fluidity, timing, and technique.
